div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

It is me, just ten years later. I have thirty-two years. I live in Belgium with my first love, {name}, and our dog. We live in a little house with a garden and for that we have a bank loan. We do not have much money but we have an interesting job. I am a drama actor and {name} is a game designer. I love my life but I think that something is missing...
